description: The SNMP trap that is generated when a
board is inserted into a particular
slot in the chassis.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD LB3GH-1-0-7::lbSlotInsertEvent LB3GH-1-0-7::lbSlotIndex i 9999 LB3GH-1-0-7::lbSlotBoardType i 1 LB3GH-1-0-7::lbSlotBoardRevision s E

description: The physical slot number of this slot within the
system.
variables.name: LB3GH-1-0-7::lbSlotIndex

description: The type of board residing in this slot.
variables.name: LB3GH-1-0-7::lbSlotBoardType

description: The revision number of the board in this slot.
variables.name: LB3GH-1-0-7::lbSlotBoardRevision

description: The SNMP trap that is generated when a
board is extracted from a particular
slot in the chassis.
The physical slot number of this slot within the
system.
variables.name: LB3GH-1-0-7::lbSlotIndex

description: The SNMP trap that is generated when the number of
addresses stored in the bridge reaches
lbBridgeAddressThreshold.

event.Summary: Number of addresses stored in the bridge reached its threshold

description: A unique value for each bridge function in the system.
It's value ranges between 1 and the value of
lbSystemBridgeFunctionCount.
variables.name: LB3GH-1-0-7::lbBridgeIndex

description: The slot number of the lowest numbered slot which
contains a physical port that this bridge function
controls.
variables.name: LB3GH-1-0-7::lbBridgeBaseSlotIndex

description: The SNMP trap that is generated when the system
temperature exceeds a certain threshold.
The SNMP trap that is generated when the temperature of
a board in a particular slot exceeds a certain threshold.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD LB3GH-1-0-7::lbSlotOverTemperatureEvent LB3GH-1-0-7::lbSlotIndex i 9999 LB3GH-1-0-7::lbSlotBoardType i 1 LB3GH-1-0-7::lbSlotBoardRevision s E LB3GH-1-0-7::lbSlotBoardStatus i 1

description: The physical slot number of this slot within the
system.
variables.name: LB3GH-1-0-7::lbSlotIndex

description: The type of board residing in this slot.
variables.name: LB3GH-1-0-7::lbSlotBoardType

description: The revision number of the board in this slot.
variables.name: LB3GH-1-0-7::lbSlotBoardRevision

description: The status of the board in this slot.
variables.name: LB3GH-1-0-7::lbSlotBoardStatus

description: The SNMP trap that is generated when a power supply
unit fails in the system.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD LB3GH-1-0-7::lbPowerSupplyFailureEvent LB3GH-1-0-7::lbPowerSupplyIndex i 9999 LB3GH-1-0-7::lbPowerSupplyLocation i 9999 LB3GH-1-0-7::lbPowerSupplyLastFailure i 1 LB3GH-1-0-7::lbSystemPowerSupplyCount i 9999

description: A unique value for each power supply in the system.
It's value ranges between 1 and the value of
lbSystemPowerSupplyCount.
variables.name: LB3GH-1-0-7::lbPowerSupplyIndex

description: The physical slot in which this power supply unit
resides in the system.
variables.name: LB3GH-1-0-7::lbPowerSupplyLocation

description: This object represents the most recent power
supply failure type. If no failure has occured
the value of this object is none. This object is
included in the varlist when the lbPowerSupplyFailureEvent
trap is generated. It indicates the failure type that
caused the trap to be generated.
variables.name: LB3GH-1-0-7::lbPowerSupplyLastFailure

description: The number of power supply units present in the system.
variables.name: LB3GH-1-0-7::lbSystemPowerSupplyCount
